articles.author: Ed Mazza
articles.content:
Rep. Dan Crenshaw (R-Texas) said he would kill right-wing media personality Tucker Carlson if the two ever met in person.
Have you ever met Tucker? Steven Edginton of Britains GB News asked Crenshaw… [+3032 chars]
articles.description: The Republican lawmaker had harsh words for the right-wing commentator during a moment apparently caught on a hot mic.
articles.title: Rep. Dan Crenshaw Says He'd 'F**king Kill' Tucker Carlson If They Ever Met

articles.description: Many people noted that Reid wasn't the only person of color being canned by the cable network.
articles.title: Social Media Reacts To MSNBC's Cancellation Of Joy Reid's Show
